definition: Three Kingdoms period (220-280) in Chinese history/several Three Kingdoms periods in Korean history, esp. from 1st century AD to unification under Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2] in 658
surname San
three/3
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guo

Romance of the Three Kingdoms by Luo Guanzhong 羅貫中|罗贯中[Luo2 Guan4 zhong1], one of the Four Classic Novels of Chinese literature/a fictional account of the Three Kingdoms at the break-up of the Han around 200 AD, consistently portraying Liu Bei's Shu Han 劉備|刘备, 蜀漢|蜀汉 as virtuous heroes and Cao Cao's Wei 曹操, 魏 as tyrannical villains
History of the Three Kingdoms, fourth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Chen Shou 陳壽|陈寿[Chen2 Shou4] in 289 during Jin Dynasty 晉朝|晋朝[Jin4 chao2], 65 scrolls
see 共產國際|共产国际[Gong4 chan3 Guo2 ji4]

History of Three Kingdoms (Korean: Samguk Sagi), the oldest extant Korean history, compiled under Kim Busik 金富軾|金富轼[Jin1 Fu4 shi4] in 1145. The three kingdoms are Goguryeo 高句麗|高句丽[Gao1 gou1 li2], Baekje 百濟|百济[Bai3 ji4], Silla 新羅|新罗[Xin1 luo2].

sentences.english: " The romance of the Three Kingdoms " in figure on each side of its state, long or short.
sentences.chinese: 《三國演義》中的人物各具其態，有長有短。

sentences.english: The Freedom Cup is a competition between New Zealand and South Africa during the Tri-Nations.
sentences.chinese: 自由杯是在三國賽期間新西蘭和南非競爭的一個盃賽。

sentences.english: The dispute was settled by mediation of the third country.
sentences.chinese: 這場爭端通過第三國的斡旋而得以解決。

sentences.english: Nor would we undertake an obligation to concert US-Soviet actions toward third countries.
sentences.chinese: 我們也不承擔協調美蘇針對第三國行動的義務。

sentences.english: Therefore, studies on Mao' Edition extremely has the value.
sentences.chinese: 所以研究毛氏對《三國》的修訂是非常有價值的。

sentences.english: My favorite book is the romance of The Three Kingdoms by luo guanzhong in Ming dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜愛的書是明代羅貫中所著《三國演義》了。

sentences.english: Historical Pinghua has much bearing on the novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 講史平話與《三國演義》成書的關係十分密切。

sentences.english: Chen Jian Bin, he played Cao Cao in the new Three Kingdoms drama.
sentences.chinese: 陳建斌，他在最新的三國電視劇中演了曹操。

sentences.english: This article presents an empirical analysis of the relationship between economic interdependence and international third-party interactions.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出經濟互賴與第三國國際互動之實證研究分析。

sentences.english: The Kuomintang government to sign a peace treaty with Japan and join the triple alliance.
sentences.chinese: 民黨政府同日本訂立和平條約，加入三國同盟。

sentences.english: The Killers of Three Kingdoms represents a milestone in the market.
sentences.chinese: 在棋類遊戲市場，三國殺是一個里程碑。

sentences.english: The Arbitration may also be settled in a third county mutually agreed upon by both parties.
sentences.chinese: 在雙方均同意的拈況下，仲裁可在第三國進行。

sentences.english: He was Jiangdong star in the Three Kingdoms period.
sentences.chinese: 他是在三國時期江東明星。

sentences.english: Some teachers even ask little children to read Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 有的老師甚至叫小孩子去讀《三國演義》。

sentences.english: The Yiling War was a significant war which broke out in the early period of the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 夷陵之戰是三國初年影響深遠的一場戰爭。

sentences.english: Chengdu was the capital of Shu during the Three Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 成都是三國時期蜀國的首都。
